title: mStats - mStable Dashboard
body:
Project Description:
mStats has been in motion since February 2021. Grant-funded development started in June, and the first version of the dashboard was delivered on the 1st August 2021.

What started as a contribution by a community member, producing weekly reports (e.g. https://t.co/xK82bIYFIs?amp=1) manually, and publishing them via mStats twitter account (https://twitter.com/mStats4), evolved into an idea to try and build a solution capable of producing those insights automatically. In May, a grant submission was made to build a solution to fetch these stats automatically. This, too, evolved into a bigger vision - building a single dashboard that provides all mStable insights to the world. 

On 1st of June, the initial grant of 3750 mUSD + 2419.29 MTA was received, which allowed us to build and ship the first version of the dashboard which is currently awaiting deployment by the mStable team. Roughly two months later, a live (test) version is ready to be deployed:
http://ec2-18-191-245-192.us-east-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8080/report

More information about how the project evolved in the April, May-June, and July update report is published at the mStable Forum: 
https://forum.mstable.org/u/dundomaroye

Roadmap: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1z9txiVEJqLtx6VxmIqTfYdnhd7lD16tYOcIr58BQAkU/edit?usp=sharing ​

Funding Objective:
4 to 6 weeks of work for development of Roadmap

Funding Schedule:
$9,200 USD

Recipient's Address:
0x8CAB47bb2279d347eDAbF3D86ce26BaE586FdE20

Additional Contributions:
N/A
author: 0xC5e1569772b2d425Ac9469d39F17341C01e1CF4c
